text: Krasnaya Zvezda (, literally "Red Star") is the official newspaper of the Soviet and later Russian Ministry of Defence. Today its official designation is "Central Organ of the Russian Ministry of Defence." Krasnaya Zvezda was created by the decision of the Politburo of the Central Committee of the RCP (b) on November 29, 1923 as the central printing body of the People's Commissariat of defense of the USSR for military Affairs (later the Ministry of Defense of the USSR).
